metadata.title: Bio-groom BDL COND Super Cream 16OZ
features: USE: Our Super Cream Coat Conditioning Concentrate moisturizes your dog’s skin to help prevent and relieve dryness and itching. This product instantly and deeply conditions dry and damaged coats, leaving pets’ coats shiny with a non-oily feel.

FEATURES: An incredibly effective oil treatment for pets’ coat and skin, our oil-rich cream formula contains wheat germ oil, protein, vitamin E and other special cosmetic grade coat and skin conditioners.
GENTLE and EASY-TO-USE: This product allows for easy wet and dry combing. Our formula is non-irritating, anti-static, and pH balanced.
SAFE and CRUELTY FREE: This Super Cream Coat Conditioning Concentrate is cruelty free, silicone free, and safe to use with topical flea and tick treatments.
QUALITY: Recommended by top breeders and professional groomers worldwide.
description: Our Super Cream Coat Conditioning Concentrate moisturizes your dog’s skin to help prevent and relieve dryness and itching. This product instantly and deeply conditions dry and damaged coats, leaving pets’ coats shiny with a non-oily feel. This product allows for easy wet and dry combing. An incredibly effective oil treatment for pets’ coat and skin, our oil-rich cream formula contains wheat germ oil, protein, vitamin E and other special cosmetic grade coat and skin conditioners. Our formula is non-irritating, anti-static, and pH balanced. This Super Cream Coat Conditioning Concentrate is cruelty free, silicone free, and safe to use with topical flea and tick treatments. Recommended by top breeders and professional groomers worldwide.

title: Must Watch Before Buying! Make it Easy to Detangle and Soft
Hydrating Butter is a non-oily lotion for skin and coat.
